mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(cbuf.createTime/1000),'%d日')as name, count(cud.id) as value,cud.sex as sex FROM cm_bi_user_flow cbuf LEFT JOIN cm_user_detail cud ON cbuf.uid = cud.`code` WHERE cbuf.eventType = 1 AND date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(cud.createDate/1000),'%Y-%m') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval 0 month),'%Y-%m') AND date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%d') <= #{day} GROUP BY name, sex

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%c月')as name, count(id) as value,deviceType FROM cm_bi_user_flow WHERE date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%Y-%m') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{month} month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY name,deviceType

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(FROM_UNIXTIME(cbuf.createTime/1000),'%m月')as name, count(cbuf.id) as value FROM cm_bi_user_flow cbuf WHERE cbuf.eventType = 1 and cbuf.uid is not null AND date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%Y') = #{year} AND date_format(FROM_UNIXTIME(createTime/1000),'%Y-%m') = date_format(date_sub(curdate(), interval #{month} month),'%Y-%m') GROUP BY name
